virtualization.deleteModalMessage: This will permanently delete Virtualization "{{name}}".  Proceed with the delete?
virtualization.deleteViewModalMessage: Are you sure you want to delete the "{{name}}" view?
virtualization.emptyStateInfoMessage: There are no virtualizations available. Please click on the button below to create one.
virtualization.virtualizationsPageDescription: Syndesis creates and manages data virtualizations to expose as data source connections.
virtualization.createViewTip: Create a new View for this virtualization
virtualization.importDataSourceTip: Import views from a data source
virtualization.unpublishModalMessage: This Virtualization has been published.  Please unpublish Virtualization "{{name}}" first.
virtualization.viewEmptyStateInfo: There are no views available. Please click one of the buttons below to create views.
virtualization.viewDescriptionValidationError: View description cannot contain a quote
virtualization.viewEditorDescription: Edit, validate and save the View Definition
virtualization.viewSqlFormRowLimitDescription: Maximum number of rows to return from your query
virtualization.viewSqlFormRowOffsetDescription: Number of rows to skip in the returned query results
virtualization.viewSqlFormSqlStatementDescription: Enter SQL query and click SUBMIT (i.e. SELECT a, b FROM view1)
virtualization.queryResultsTableEmptyStateInfo:
Query has not yet been executed.
Select view, enter SQL query and click 'Submit'
virtualization.queryViewFailed: An error occurred querying the selected view. Details: {{details}}
virtualization.queryViewSuccess: The selected view was successfully queried.
virtualization.publishVirtualizationNoViews: Cannot publish virtualization {{name}} - No views are defined
virtualization.importViewsSuccess: Import data source completed for virtualization {{name}}.
virtualization.importViewsFailed: Import data source failed for virtualization {{name}}. Details: {{details}}
